name: SPOODER BALL
description:
This Game was made by WeCat, Mother Bruno, and Pakmanlie.

////////////////////////////////////////////*IMPORTANT*////////////////////////////////////////////

(There's a bug where you can die in the tutorial ,  coming in contact with enemies will damage you in the tutorial)

It's an arcade-style top-down game.

Dash through webbed enemies to gain charges for the Bug ball.

Use your bug ball for destroying ALL enemies, bigger enemies can only be defeated with this.

(Also there's a bug where you skip over the end screen if you are holding space once you die)
